content:
hashimoto-kei commented on PR #11329:

Thank you for your feedback.

As you said, it is not better for README to notify specific instructions, but better for the install script to print specific instructions.

This fixes README to notify users should follow the on-screen instructions printed by the install script.

hashimoto-kei edited a comment on PR #11329:

Thank you for your feedback.

As you said, it is not better for README to notify specific instructions, but better for the install script to print specific instructions.

This fixes README to notify users should follow the on-screen instructions printed by the install script.

FYI, I referenced the following.
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime.dev/blob/481a3aee5b86617b499274452dda34fe928fd7b0/index.md?plain=1#L40-L41

hashimoto-kei edited a comment on PR #11329:

Thank you for your feedbacks.

As you said, it is better for the install script to print specific instructions.
(And it is not good for README to notify specific instructions.)

In this fix, README only tells users to follow the on-screen instructions printed by the install script.

FYI, I referenced the following.
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime.dev/blob/481a3aee5b86617b499274452dda34fe928fd7b0/index.md?plain=1#L40-L41
